quotes.quote: The greatest profit, is to make your own gain.
Profit is sweet, even if it comes from deception.
When profit is unshared, it's less likely to grow greater.
Legitimate profit is good. What's bad is profiteering.
Profit is the payment you get when you take advantage of change.
Profit has to be a means to other ends rather than an end in itself.
Profit is not the purpose of a business, but rather the test of its validity.
Showing a profit means touching something and leaving it better than you found it.
Profit doesn't appear as the goal but as a side effect of pursuing motivating principles.
To gain profit is important, but you must invest to build up assets that you can cash in in the future.
Profit is not the proper end and aim of management - it is what makes all of the proper ends and aims possible.
Profits are better than wages. Wages make you a living; profits make you a fortune.
The future of profit is purpose.
If you mean to profit, learn to praise.
A small profit it better than a big loss.
Profit is a blessing, if it's not stolen.
No profit grows where no pleasure is taken.
A musical profit outweighs a financial loss.
The profit on a good action is to have done it.
Profit is what happens when you do everything else right.
The smell of profit is clean and sweet, whatever the source.
Good profits simply are not inconsistent with good behavior.
Profit is a reward for satisfying the desire of someone else.
To profit from good advice requires more wisdom than to give it.
Profits are what you make when not working.
Profit is a by-product of work; happiness is its chief product.
We always think of our own profit, but not in connection to others.
The profit we possess after study is to have become better and wiser.
Too much profit is being made at the expense of unsuspecting patients.
Profits are part of the mechanism by which society decides what it wants to see produced.
